name: SELECT MILK PRODUCERS, INC.
description: Dairy producer cooperative providing marketing services to its member-owners.
sampleDescriptions: Generally communicated the importance of repealing and replacing the Waters of the U.S. Rule implemented by EPA.

Supported passage of H.R. 4092, the Agricultural Guestworker Act.  To date, dairy farms have not qualified to apply for H2A guest workers, as the program requires that jobs be "temporary" or "seasonal

Communicated the need to expand existing investment tax credits for equipment used to collect biogas used to generate electricity to equipment used to in biogas projects that use the gas for other pur
Communicated the need to reform the Margin Protection Program in the 2018 Farm Bill, and the importance of agricultural exports to Canada and Mexico.
Communicated the need to reform the Margin Protection Program in HR 2, the 2018 Farm Bill, and the importance of agricultural exports to Canada and Mexico.
